title: Warning: If You Find A Shirt Tucked Over Windshield | Big Boy's Neighborhood | REAL 92.3
text:
This is very important to watch and be aware of. 
19-year-old Ashley Hardacre finished work at a mall in Michigan and after she went get her car. 
Once she got in her car, she noticed that a shirt had been tucked under her windscreen wiper. Immediately she knew something weird was up and that she was potentially in danger.
